video.title: The Grand
video.synopsis: Welcome to The Grand, a four-star 1920s English hotel where adultery, greed, prostitution and plenty of juicy gossip are served in high style.

episodes.synopsis: On New Year's Eve, the Bannermans celebrate the reopening of their hotel. But a tragedy soon exposes the shocking state of the hotel's finances.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The hotel proves inhospitable to a former maid in a desperate situation. Later, Monica discovers the woman's true profession.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Stephen steals money from the family safe to impress his beguiling new girlfriend, Celia -- who turns out to have a shocking past.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: After meeting soldiers who served with his son, an agitated Mr. Collins must confront his ambivalence regarding his son's death.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Adele's childhood friend stays at The Grand while recuperating from surgery, she drags Adele and the servants into her mischief.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Worried that he may have been exposed to a deadly disease, John makes a surprising confession to Sarah. Meanwhile, Monica makes an impulsive decision.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: When James gets called back to London, Monica finds herself with no place to stay -- which leads to a horrifying turn of events.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: As Monica awaits her fate amid speculation about who paid for her defense, wedding preparations continue at The Grand, and the staff rebels.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Isobel Crawford arrives to help care for her granddaughter, Ruth, and quickly becomes a pernicious presence.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: After hiring a former army buddy who mugs a club patron, Stephen must choose between the law and loyalty to his friend.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Ruth faces a crisis and resorts to the black market to resolve it. Meanwhile, Stephen begins dating a beautiful young woman named Christina.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: One of the men who assaulted Monica returns to The Grand, and the staff -- except for sympathetic hall porter Fred Willets -- refuses to serve him.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: With Marcus managing the hotel, the staff members begin to worry about their futures. Meanwhile, a mysterious guest creates a stir during her stay.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Clive gets a promotion, but his liaison with a guest forces him to acknowledge some painful truths. Meanwhile, Stephen and Christina become engaged.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: With the expected delivery date already past, Ruth escapes to London and demands that Dr. Curzon induce the surrogate mother's labor.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: As Esme begins planning her business venture with Marcus, a rival attempts to lure her away. Meanwhile, Kate suffers an injury on the job.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Baby Charles' birth mother forces Ruth to give her a job at The Grand. Then, Mrs. Harvey walks out after Kate's promotion to assistant housekeeper.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Stephen meets Kate's parents, but his involvement with the club threatens their relationship. Meanwhile, Marcus suffers a crisis of conscience.
episodes.title: Episode 18
